Package fr.utbm.vrp.agents

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllocationAgent
    AllocationAgent
    His goal is to insert customers where the insertion cost is minimized
    Strategies: CNP-RA
    BootAgent
    Boot agent
    His goal is just to launch the task agent and then die
    MAS Systems based on Agents towards vehicle routing problems article
    Strategy implemented: FIFO-ITER-CNP-RA
    customerInserted
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent to tell that the customer has been inserted
    It is a reply to insertCustomer event
    customerRelocated
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent to tell that the customer have been inserted
    finish
    Event from TaskAgent to AllocationAgent to indicates that there is no more customers to insert
    finishVehicle
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to indicates that there is no more customer to insert
    insertCustomer
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to tell the vehicle to insert the given customer
    It's launched when all vehicle agents have send their insertion cost estimation through insertionCostEstimation event
    insertCustomerEstimate
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to get the lowest cost insertion of the given customer in the vehicle agent
    insertionCostEstimation
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent to tell what is the lowest cost of insertion for the customer
    It is a reply from the insertCustomerEstimate event
    ListenerAgent
    ListenerAgent
    Subscribes to an JEDIS topic and spawns BootAgent when topic is active
    nextCustomer
    Event from TaskAgent to allocationAgent to send a new customer to insert It's a reply to the nextCustomerRequest
    nextCustomerRequest
    Event from AllocationAgent to TaskAgent to request a new customer to insert
    relocate
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent to ask to relocate customers
    relocateCostEstimation
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent to tell the relocation cost estimated by the VehicleAgent
    relocateCustomer
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to insert a customers
    relocateCustomerEstimate
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to get the estimation cost of an relocation of the customer to relocate it
    removeAll
    Event from AllocationAgent to VehicleAgent to ask the VehicleAgent to remove and return all the customers in its route
    We follow the RA strategy
    solution
    Event from VehicleAgent to AllocationAgent and AllocationAgent to TaskAgent to get the solution build
    TaskAgent
    Task Agent
    His goal is to give the customers to the allocation agent
    Strategies implemented: FIFO-ITER
    VehicleAgent
    VehicleAgent
    His goal is to keep a valid solution route
    vehicleInserted
    Event triggered by AllocationAgent to TaskAgent to prevent that a new vehicle has been inserted
